line.comment: *Zero Hour 1.6 adds ZMap 1.3 support for custom OCV Maelstrom portal location
* Zero Hour mod OCV Portal creation, uses the most isolated Xenon sector
* Also create random small groups of Xenons and beacons in Unknown sectors.

sval.val: Zero Hour 1.6 adds ZMap 1.3 support for custom OCV Maelstrom portal location
Zero Hour mod OCV Portal creation, uses the most isolated Xenon sector
Also create random small groups of Xenons and beacons in Unknown sectors.
